document.full_text: jackson hewitt tax service inc  filed for a pre-packaged chapter 11 bankruptcy, as the second largest u.s. tax preparer finally reached an agreement with its lenders on how to restructure its debt.
document.title: jackson hewitt files for pre-packaged bankruptcy
lines_and_colors: jackson hewitt tax service inc  filed for a pre-packaged chapter 11 bankruptcy, as the second largest u.s. tax preparer finally reached an agreement with its lenders on how to restructure its debt.
